entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Whitecourt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning late this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
